abstract: The buzz is back: Speculation about a deal between Inbev and Anheuser Busch returned to Wall Street on Friday, when FT Alphaville reported that Inbev was considering a $46 billion takeover approach to its United States-based rival.
lead_paragraph: The buzz is back: Speculation about a deal between Inbev and Anheuser Busch returned to Wall Street on Friday, when FT Alphaville reported that Inbev was considering a $46 billion takeover approach to its United States-based rival.

headline.main: Rumors Fly About Big Beer Deal
